DOC.brief_summary: This is a safety and efficacy study of LiRIS® in females with interstitial cystitis/bladder pain syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study of LiRIS® in Females With Interstitial Cystitis/Bladder Pain Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of interstitial cystitis or bladder pain syndrome Diagnosis of interstitial cystitis with Hunner's lesions/ulcers Previous treatment with LiRIS®
